creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: four braided tassels attached, at "top", of various widths; one divides into three narrow strands; each of the braids has multiple tassels and white mother-of-pearl buttons; green and orange
dimension:
14 1/2 in. (36.83 cm) (object part, one tassel)
10 1/2 in. (26.67 cm) (object part, two tassels)

title: Tassel
